word:
Prescott Urged to Do Evangelistic Work--The Lord has given him [W. W. Prescott] light, and there are many who will be enlightened and blessed by the message of truth that he can give. The work that the Lord would have 


                                  -360- 

him do in giving a knowledge of the third angel's message to those who are in error will be as a light shining from the Scriptures to enlighten others.
